Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('L1','C1','C2','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.1)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.1 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a smaller line size.
Beta must be <= 0.316 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a larger line size. please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C2','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.75)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.75 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a larger line size. please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('E1','E2','E3','S2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.46)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.46 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a smaller line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('E1','E2','E3','S2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.84)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.84 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a larger line size. please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] < 0.245)
ShortName: Beta value must be >= 0.245 - Consider using a lower DP to achieve a larger Beta or consider using a smaller line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.6)
ShortName: Beta must be <= 0.6 - Consider reducing Beta by accepting a higher DP or consider using a larger line size. please check the acceptability of the overall pressure loss.
RTJ plates require support diameter to be specified
Support diameter not necessary (ID is used)

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] <= 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 5000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta <= 0.56, Reynolds number must be >= 5000 - Reynolds number is less than the min limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.
Notes: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2)  minimum B<56

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('C1','C3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([Beta] > 0.56) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 16000 * [Beta] * [Beta])
ShortName: For Concentric plates with corner or (D + D/2) taps with Beta > 0.56, Reynolds number must be <= 16000*Beta² - Reynolds number is greater than the max limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.
Notes: Beta/Reynolds @ meter max/Design (concentric:corner or D D/2) minimum B>56

ShortName: For Concentric plates with Flange taps, Reynolds number must be >= 5000  -  Reynolds number is less than the min limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN}='C2') AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < 170 * [Beta] * [Beta] * [PipeID]{length,PipeIDUnits} * 1000)
ShortName: For Concentric plates with Flange taps, Reynolds number must be >= 170 * Beta² * PipeID (in mm) - Reynolds number is less than the min limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < (200000 * [Beta] * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number must be >= 200000 * Beta² - Reynolds number is less than the min limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider decreasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('S2','E1','E2','E3')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (1000000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Segmental & Eccentric plates, Reynolds number must be <= 1000000 * Beta - Reynolds number is greater than the max limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] > (100000 * [Beta]))
ShortName: For Quarter circle plates, Reynolds number must be < 100000*Beta- Reynolds number is greater than the max limit for this product, please check the accuracy of the input data or consider increasing the line size.

Expression: ([SelectedItem]{CH/FPD/ORIFICE/DESIGN} IN ('U1','U2')) AND ([Beta] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] IS NOT NULL) AND ([ReynoldsNoAtMeterMax] < ((1000 * [Beta]) + (9400000 * ([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24)*([Beta] - 0.24))))

Inclined Up TG2 - Please consider your tapping orientation selection - Inclined up is recommended for all gas applications to ensure condensate drains back into the pipe and does not collect in impulse pipes.
Horizontal TG3 - Please consider your tapping orientation - Recommended for all steam applications.
Inclined Down TG4 - Please consider your tapping orientation - Recommended for all liquid applications to ensure gas vents back into the pipe and does not collect in impulse pipes.
